title: Nathan Confronts David
summary: The prophet Nathan rebukes David using a parable. David confesses his sin, and though God forgives him, He announces consequences: the child will die and violence will plague David’s house. Solomon is later born to David and Bathsheba.

faq.question: How did Nathan confront David?
faq.answer: Through a parable about a rich man stealing a poor man's lamb, which exposed David’s guilt.

faq.question: What were the consequences of David’s sin?
faq.answer: The death of the child and ongoing turmoil in his family.
